languages.text: "Они желают знать, продолжится ли их братоубийственная битва. Как думаешь, {name}, что мне надлежит ответить им?"
"They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"
languages.original_text: "Они желают знать, продолжится ли их братоубийственная битва. Как думаешь, {name}, что мне надлежит ответить им?"

traits.locale_text: "They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “他们想知道，这场自相残杀的战斗有没有必要继续进行下去。你觉得我应该如何作答，{name}？”
languages.original_text: "They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: “他们想知道，这场自相残杀的战斗有没有必要继续进行下去。你觉得我应该如何作答，{name}？”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Ils souhaitent savoir si leur bataille fratricide doit se poursuivre. Quelle réponse devons-nous leur donner, {name} ? »
languages.original_text: "They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: « Ils souhaitent savoir si leur bataille fratricide doit se poursuivre. Quelle réponse devons-nous leur donner, {name} ? »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Quieren saber si su guerra fratricida debe continuar. ¿Qué debería responderles, {name}?».
languages.original_text: "They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: «Quieren saber si su guerra fratricida debe continuar. ¿Qué debería responderles, {name}?».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「彼らは恫喝合戦を続けるべきかどうかを知りたがっている。どう答えたらいいと思う、{name}よ？」
languages.original_text: "They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは恫喝合戦を続けるべきかどうかを知りたがっている。どう答えたらいいと思う、{name}よ？」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Sie wollen wissen, ob ihr brudermörderischer Konflikt fortgesetzt werden soll. Was soll ich ihnen darauf antworten, {name}?"
languages.original_text: "They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: "Sie wollen wissen, ob ihr brudermörderischer Konflikt fortgesetzt werden soll. Was soll ich ihnen darauf antworten, {name}?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Kardeşin kardeşi kırdığı çatışmaları sürecek mi, bilmek istiyorlar. Nasıl bir cevap vermeliyiz {name}?"
languages.original_text: "They wish to know if their fratricidal battle should continue. What do you think I should answer, {name}?"
